body:
Hello!
Today I Want to suggest that once that you are in game, you could do /staff command in order to see where are the staff's.

This would it would look like, if implemented:

Online Staff(6)

[Nebula][Nebula03]: DoctaPop
[Nebula][Icarus]: MarcuzFire
[Walls][Walls04]: Polar_Express
[Capture][CTW02]: Iron
[Capture][CTW01]: RileGuy
[Lobby][Hub02]: Kylocode

Please notify that these are random staff, not my Favs.

Comment

title: [Sug] Staff seeing in game

replies.body: Good idea, it'd be easier to get in contact with a staff member. However, staff members should have permissions to bypass that, just in case we're working on either reports and such.
